item.description:
Let's get outside and work off that Christmas dinner!  Come join us at Pawtuckaway State Park in Nottingham, NH.  We'll be hiking to the peak of North Mountain which has some very nice views of the park and surrounding area.  We'll also hike along the Boulder Trail which contains large boulders which were left behind by the glaciers.

This event will be posted on 2 or 3 other Meetups, so come and meet some new friends!

This is a 5.2 mile hike and should take us approximately 3 hours.  North Mountain is 995' above sea level with an elevation gain of about 700'.  Please dress warmly and in layers with appropriate hiking boots.  The ground will be frozen so we want good traction.  Bring snacks and water and we can picnic atop North Mountain while we enjoy the view.  Don't forget your camera!

Pawtuckaway State Park is off Route 101 and is easily accessible from Route 95, Route 93, or Route 125.  Let's meet at the back of the Hannafords parking lot in Raymond, NH, at 11 am, so that we can carpool to the head of the Boulder Trail.  See the address for Hannafords above--Exit 5 off Route 101 toward Nottingham.  Please be on time or early so that we can be on our way as quickly as possible.

Here are some helpful, informative links:

http://www.hikenewengland.com/North990820.html#directions

http://www.nhstateparks.org/uploads/pdf/PawtuckawayTrailMap_web.pdf

I'll be adding more information about this particular trail within the next couple of days.

I understand that dogs ARE allowed between Columbus Day and Memorial Day.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in Hannafords Parking lot, 2 Freetown Road, Raymond, NH at back of parking lot away from store

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Post-Christmas Hike at Pawtuckaway State Park
